attributes.action: Scrap the newly designed UK Olympic Games logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the PM to scrap the newly designed logo for the 2012 Olympic Games being held in this country as the design picked is total rubbish and does not reflect our country in the slightest bit. It has been a waste of PUBLIC funded money. I petition the PM to run a competition amongst the Schools of Britain to redesign a new logo that truly represents this country using this nation's colours of RED, WHITE and BLUE

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
